**Workshop**: *Executable and Reproducible Papers with Quarto and Docker* &#8212; speaker **Gabriel Strain**

In this meeting with speaker Gabriel Strain, learn how to use quarto and docker to produce a formatted, reproducible and executable conference or journal article.

This will be an **interactive workshop!** Make sure to bring your laptop, with
R, RStudio, and Docker Desktop.
